thread.title: Trump plan to overhaul infrastructure faces steep hurdles

title: Trump plan to overhaul infrastructure faces steep hurdles
text:
Trump plan to overhaul infrastructure faces steep hurdles   01:57 
U.S. President Donald Trump rolled out an infrastructure plan on Monday that already faces significant hurdles in Congress because it does not offer as much new federal funding as Democrats want or directly address how to pay for the effort.   
U.S. President Donald Trump rolled out an infrastructure plan on Monday that already faces significant hurdles in Congress because it does not offer as much new federal funding as Democrats want or directly address how to pay for the effort.  //reut.rs/2stP9pG
